title: PM strongly condemns terrorist attack on security officials
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 18 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday strongly condemned killing of four security officials in a terrorist incident along Pakistan-Iran border in Balochistan.
On his Twitter handle, the prime minister said that the nation paid homage to the sacrifices of their martyred soldiers in the line of duty.
The prime minister further said, “We expect Iran will ensure that its soil is not used for cross border attacks.”
